# Using Alpha Vantage API
```{r eval=FALSE}
library(alphavantager)

av_api_key(Sys.getenv("ALPHAVANTAGE_API_KEY"))

#for past month
data=av_get("SPY", av_fun = "TIME_SERIES_INTRADAY", 
              interval = "5min", outputsize = "full")

#for a particular month
data2=av_get("SPY", av_fun = "TIME_SERIES_INTRADAY", interval = "5min", 
              month="2009-01", outputsize = "full")

write.csv(data,"~/SPY.csv", row.names = T) #saves to documents
write.csv(data2,"~/SPY1609.csv", row.names = T) 


#test
dataT=av_get("SPY", av_fun = "TIME_SERIES_INTRADAY", interval = "5min", 
              adjusted="false", extended_hours="false", outputsize = "full")
write.csv(dataT,"~/SPYT.csv", row.names = T) 
```
